alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 27 at 7:30PM CDT until July 27 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN LINCOLN...NORTHEASTERN MARATHON...SOUTHWESTERN LANGLADE AND WESTERN SHAWANO COUNTIES... At 730 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles southwest of Veterans Memorial County Park to near Antigo to 9 miles northeast of Weston, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Antigo around 735 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Bryant, Aniwa, Glandon, Elmhurst, Ackley Wildlife Area, Mattoon, Dudley, Polar, Phlox and Kempster. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
